section.title: Sysdig Monitoring for Kubernetes
section.p: If you are deploying Sysdig monitoring on Kubernetes, select the Kubernetes | GKE | OpenShift option. You will be presented with an access code, as shown in .

fig.title: Sysdig Monitor access code for Kubernetes

section.p: You use the sysdig_access_key field in your group_vars/vault, as described in the section . Once you deploy your environment and your Kubernetes nodes connect to the Sysdig SaaS platform, Sysdig will display information regarding your setup, as shown in .
Select View Dashboard for an entry point to accessing all your monitoring data.

section.title: Sysdig Monitor for Docker swarm
section.p: If you are deploying Sysdig monitoring on Docker swarm, select the Non-Orchestrated: Native Linux option. You will be presented with a screen containing your access code.
